ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess
ygData.msgSnippet: aw man, now something else to test hehe.  well i DID test the theory about the lute doubling the healing rate every other pulse.  this is not true.  i will
ygData.messageBody:
aw man, now something else to test hehe. well i DID test the theory about
the lute doubling the healing rate every other pulse. this is not true. i
will have to go buy a regular mandolin/lute and test again hehe.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server

> From: "Christine" <christine@...>
>
> There was some discussion earlier about the Lute of the Gypsy
> Princess and
> whether or not it had any magical effects... but I don't
> remember anyone
> testing it and posting their findings here.
>
> I have now seen on several websites that the Lute has
> recently been upgraded
> to increase the power of Stringed instruments by 25%.
>
> Can anyone confirm this please? Should be easy to test with
> the healing
> song.
>
> Thanks,
>
> Daleia d'Allaney
